CONTACT FORM
HAVE A QUESTION? NEED ASSISTANCE?
WE'RE HERE TO HELP!
At Audio Golf, we're committed to providing exceptional support. Whether you're curious about our services or wondering how they can address your specific needs, we're eager to assist you.
EMAIL
info@acceleraze.golf
BOOK A CALL
We operate in multiple locations and time zones:
​
United States - Palm Beach (FL) & Westchester (NY) and
Europe - Berlin, Germany & Graz, Austria.
Please schedule a call at your convenience:

MY COURSES
About top
MEET THE PROFESSOR
A WORLD-CLASS PIANIST TURNED GOLF INNOVATOR
WHERE DID
AUDIO GOLF
COME FROM?
At 17, Chia Chou faced the daunting task of becoming a top pianist despite limited talent and training. Out of desperation, he found a shortcut that led him to win his first international competition, the equivalent of the British Open in golf, in just 4 years, at the age of 21. Subsequent successes led to a professorship at a prestigious Austrian music university.​
​
Applying his revolutionary insights to golf, he co-created the Audio Golf System, which accelerates your progress by harnessing the often-overlooked power of rhythm and tempo. ​
​
Discover how you can play better, faster.

xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?
xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?
SYDNEY OPERA HOUSE
Performing the final concert of the First Prize Winner at the 1981 Sydney International Piano Competition of Australia, onstage at the Sydney Opera House.
QUEEN FABIOLA
The Queen of Belgium, Fabiola, presenting Chia the Bronze Medal at the 1987 International Queen Elisabeth Competition in Brussels.
6x Race Across America ultracycling winner Christoph Strasser was coached by Prof. Chou
SYDNEY OPERA HOUSE
Performing the final concert of the First Prize Winner at the 1981 Sydney International Piano Competition of Australia, onstage at the Sydney Opera House.
